    • calculateTax

      public static double calculateTax​(double rate, double beforeTaxPrice)
      Calculates the tax price
      Parameters:
      rate - The rate of the tax. Eg. 0.06 is 6%, 0.20 is 20%
      beforeTaxPrice - The price before the inclusion of tax
      Returns:
      The calculated tax price

      Parameters:

    • stringDateToLocalDateTime

      public static LocalDateTime stringDateToLocalDateTime​(String stringDate) throws DateTimeParseException
      Converts the date from string to LocalDateTime
      Parameters:
      stringDate - The date in String data type
      Returns:
      The date in LocalDateTime
      Throws:
      DateTimeParseException - Exception when date is not in the correct format or not valid
